text: so at Vika this is the short summary of

make a quick stock out of the chicken
neck feet and wingtips the net onions
garlic ginger and cilantro roots once
the stock is ready season with salt and
top it off with cold water in goes the
chicken and bring the temperature of the
water up to 165 to 170 degrees
Fahrenheit and maintain it there until
the chicken is done when he's done let
him rest while we cooked the rice for
the rice we're gonna first render some
chicken fat once we've got our fat we're
gonna saute some chopped garlic in it at
the rice and stir to coat then add the
stock that we got from cooking the
chicken stir until the rice is thick and
the fat is no longer floating on top
then cover and let it cook until it's
done for the dipping sauce we're gonna
make two different types the first one
you're gonna pound together some ginger
and chilies then add fermented soybean
paste sugar black soy sauce regular soy
sauce and vinegar for dipping sauce
number two pound together garlic chilies
ginger and cilantro stems then just add
soy sauce and lime juice

after the chicken has rested and cooled
